Question: Shenzhen City Teveik Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen City Teveik Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Customized Cable Assemblies/Wire Harnesses

- Offers OEM customization for a wide variety of cable assemblies and wire harnesses
- Provides customized support based on samples or drawings
- Ensures quality control with strict adherence to international standards and a full flow chart of quality assurance
- Boasts over 13 years of experience in cable assembly and wire harness manufacturing
- Operates in a 2550㎡ production base with 35 pieces of testing equipment and a skilled research and development team
- Offers products such as custom motorcycle complete wiring harnesses, 3-pin cables for DDS machines, and Type C to DP converter cables
- Participates in the US CES Electronics Show

Contact: Mr. Binger Fu
Phone: +8613510429282
Email: info@teveik.com
Location: B601, No.21, Shiwei Pinggang Industrial Road, Shiwei Community, Matian Sub-district, Guangming District, Shenzhen City, Guangdong Province, China
Summary_cn:
深圳市特维科技有限公司。

产品：定制电缆组件/线束

- 为各种电缆组件和线束提供OEM定制服务
- 根据样品或图纸提供定制支持
- 通过严格遵循国际标准和完整的质量保证流程确保质量控制
- 在电缆组装和线束制造方面拥有超过13年的经验
- 在2550㎡的生产基地上运营，拥有35台测试设备和一支技术研发团队
- 提供定制摩托车完整布线组件、DDS机器的3针电缆和Type C转DP转换线缆等产品
- 参加美国CES电子展览会
